title: Amethyst Robe
summaries: The Amethyst Robe is an Armor item and part of the Wizard set, being wearable in the shirt slot. It is the weakest Gem Robe.

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the Amethyst Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance, while wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>Mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
